title: Lag
body: I que up for games during the weekdays i get immense lag even though it works fine on the weekends this has happened 3 times so i am trying to get to the bottom of my problem pls do not ban me thx

replies.body:
There are a number of local network settings that could be causing this to happen. I suggest taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that should help resolve this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your issues.
What connection do you use?  Give more info.
I know it is just my computer i might get a new wifi chip and see if that works because my family's other devices work
